content: Does anyone here know about hapi-fhir-jpaserver? I am from bulk data track and we started a server with this repo, https://github.com/hapifhir/hapi-fhir-jpaserver-starter, but it does not seem to have the $export operation, which is used for bulk data transfer. Any input would be helpful. Thanks!
In hapi fhir version 3.3 how could we export all of the data from all resources as JSON files per resource?
